body_html:
Hi,

Another thing I tried is to run Mobilenet model for tflite on the phone and it worked and succeeded to allocate the tensors.

Maybe there is a problem on the way I have converted the files with Toco?
(This is the command I ran, there was no errors when I used the following)
bazel-bin/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/toco
--input_format=TENSORFLOW_GRAPHDEF
--input_file=/home/model_for_freezing/output_graph.pb
--output_format=TFLITE
--output_file=/tmp/my_model.tflite
--inference_type=FLOAT
--inference_input_type=FLOAT
--input_arrays=patches
--output_arrays=output

Thanks

body:
Hi,

Another thing I tried is to run Mobilenet model for tflite on the phone and it worked and succeeded to allocate the tensors.

Maybe there is a problem on the way I have converted the files with Toco?
(This is the command I ran, there was no errors when I used the following)
bazel-bin/tensorflow/contrib/lite/toco/toco 
--input_format=TENSORFLOW_GRAPHDEF 
--input_file=/home/model_for_freezing/output_graph.pb 
--output_format=TFLITE 
--output_file=/tmp/my_model.tflite 
--inference_type=FLOAT 
--inference_input_type=FLOAT 
--input_arrays=patches
--output_arrays=output                   

Thanks
